nodes.text: 0U-1FY was an associate of the Hutt Cartel who designed a remote access point to the HoloNet during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

0U-1FY was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a description of the item "Data Entry," which players could use to recover their health points. 0U-1FY is a direct reference to a member of the game's community, Dulfy, who runs a fan site and guide.
